title: Quitting League of Legends
body:
League of Legends has become more than a game, it has become a frustrating game that has hacked into my brain and partly destroyed my soul. Everyday, I get matched up with noobs who can not even farm. Including retards who constantly feed for no reason at all and decide to troll for fun, Riot is not making this any better. Riot instead does not seem to be picking out the feeders, the people who actually do random crap. Even though they are saying " we are banning noobs, removing feeders" i see people just more likely to feed because they are saying this. Not to say Riot's matchmaking process, there should be a rule that every 3 weeks, a player is tested on his ability to play a game and once they have finished their games (like provisional) they are ranked on how good they are and therefore can actually be matched up with players of the same skill not above their skill or below but at their pace.  However, Riot is not trying to solve the problem but keep on introducing skins and champions including the recent release of Tahm Kench. Riot STILL doesn't know the troll ability of the champion and continues to keep it that way. 

What I'm trying to say is that, Riot should make the game more enjoyable instead of making the game frustrating to play, since the matching of noobs and the existence of feeders is still a large problem. If Riot continues this very bad way of gaming people WILL become frustrated, eve though it's just a game, everyone knows the feeling of losing due to a troll on your team, if that was a rela player you could have won, but no, it HAD to be a troll.

So Riot PLEASE... do something smart for once, I am not trying to offend, just expressing my feeling about League and how it is working for me. There SHOULD be change, and PLEASE make it quick.

Please, if anyone feels that something is wrong please tell, I am open to quitting or playing League, but it is really getting on my nerves. Please comment and vote on the poll below.
